definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: That financial risks diehard of many private enterprises is the main cause toward their dooms.
sentences.chinese: 财务隐患的积重难返是很多民营企业走向末路的主因。

sentences.english: Lack of progress is the main reason why so many students quit piano.
sentences.chinese: 没有进步是大多数学生放弃学琴的主因。

sentences.english: The economic plight of the urban poor was the main factor behind the May 1998 anti-Chinese riots.
sentences.chinese: 村庄穷人的经济困境是一九八五年排华暴动的主因。

sentences.english: Self-distrust is the cause of most of our failure.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏自信是失败的主因。

sentences.english: According to the statistics, it is the main cause of most car accidents.
sentences.chinese: 根据统计，它是不部份车祸的主因。

sentences.english: Alcoholic hepatitis is a major cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 酒精肝是世界范围类致病死亡的主因所在。

sentences.english: The quick succession of strokes is what causes the lightning channel to flicker.
sentences.chinese: 接二连三的快速闪击，则是使闪电通道闪烁的主因。

sentences.english: Large rat-like animals called nutrias are also causing problems.
sentences.chinese: 大型的鼠科动物海狸鼠也是造成湿地消失的主因。

sentences.english: Extensive replication in the blood is generally what kills patients who succumb to anthrax .
sentences.chinese: 血液内大量繁殖的细菌通常是炭疽病致死的主因。

sentences.english: Global Temperature Forced by Solar Irradiation and Greenhouse Gases?
sentences.chinese: 咸信温室效应气体是导致全球气温升高的主因。

sentences.english: It is believed that greenhouse gases are the main causes of global warming .
sentences.chinese: 咸信温室效应气体是导致全球气温升高的主因。

definition: criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to trace something to its source (idiom)
hard lump in the abdomen (in Chinese medicine)/crux of an issue/main point in an argument/sticking point/deadlock in negotiations
